Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body and neck section of a buff-coloured fine pottery pilgrim-flask, the exterior is burnished and covered with a self-slip and bears the faint traces of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393440) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393440)
